description:
## SPARQL engine action part I
### This mapping shows how to use the [SPARQL Engine action](https://github.com/helio-ecosystem/helio-action-sparql-engine) for querying RDF using SPARQL. The next part, [SPARQL engine action part II](https://helio-playground.linkeddata.es/tour/SIoTRx%20tutorial%20on%20actions/SPARQL%20engine%20action%20-%20part%20II), shows how to query not only RDF data ambedded in the mapping but also RDF provided by a URL or remote SPARQL endpoints. Note that the rdf is expressed in `TURTLE`, [SPARQL engine action part III](https://helio-playground.linkeddata.es/tour/SIoTRx%20tutorial%20on%20actions/SPARQL%20engine%20action%20-%20part%20III) shows how to setup different configuration points of this action to support also other formats and modify the output query results format among other options.
user_template:
<#-- RDF data -->
<#assign rdf>
@prefix : <http://example.org/resources/> .
@prefix schema: <https://schema.org/> .

:alice schema:name      "Alice Cooper" .
 
:bob   schema:givenName "Bob", "Robert" ;
       schema:lastName  "Smith" .

:carol schema:name      "Carol King" ;
       schema:givenName "Carol" ;
       schema:lastName  "King" .
</#assign>

<#-- Setting up the query and running the engine -->
<#assign config = '{"query" : "select * where {?s ?p ?o}" }'>
<@action type="SparqlEngine" data=rdf conf=config; result>
[=result]
</@action>
